TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeLib2 implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeLib

summary.span: 提供 接口的托管定义。

span.span: Provides a managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关其他信息`ITypeLib2`接口，请参阅 MSDN 库。For additional information about the `ITypeLib2` interface, see the MSDN Library. 在本机代码中的 COM 方法将返回的 HRESULT 时，公共语言运行时将引发异常。The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 映射 Hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

param.name: szNameBuf
param.span: 要搜索的名称。

span.span: The name to search for.

param.name: lHashVal
param.span: 一个用于加快搜索速度的哈希值，由 函数计算。

span.span: A hash value to speed up the search, computed by the function.

param.span: 如果 lHashVal 为 0，则计算一个值。

span.span: If lHashVal is 0, a value is computed.

param.name: ppTInfo
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含一个指向类型说明的指针数组，这些类型说明中包含 szNameBuf 中指定的名称。

span.span: When this method returns, contains an array of pointers to the type descriptions that contain the name specified in szNameBuf.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: rgMemId
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含所找到的项的 数组；rgMemId [i] 是用于通过索引访问 ppTInfo [i] [i] 指定的类型说明的 。

span.span: When this method returns, contains an array of the s of the found items; rgMemId [i] is the that indexes into the type description specified by ppTInfo [i].

param.span: 此参数不能为 。

span.span: This parameter cannot be .

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: pcFound
param.span: 输入时由引用传递的一个值，该值指示要查找的实例数。

span.span: On entry, a value, passed by reference, that indicates how many instances to look for.

param.span: 例如，可以调用 pcFound = 1 以查找第一个匹配项。

span.span: For example, pcFound = 1 can be called to find the first occurrence.

param.span: 找到一个实例时停止搜索。

span.span: The search stops when one instance is found.

param.span: 在退出时指示找到的实例数。

span.span: On exit, indicates the number of instances that were found.

param.span: 如果 pcFound 的 和 值完全相同，则可能存在其他包含此名称的类型说明。

span.span: If the and values of pcFound are identical, there might be more type descriptions that contain the name.

summary.span: 在类型库中查找类型说明的匹配项。

span.span: Finds occurrences of a type description in a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须有足够的空间中`rgMemId`参数来保存`pcFound`条目。There must be enough room in the `rgMemId` parameter to hold the `pcFound` entries. 有关其他信息`ITypeLib::FindName`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For additional information about `ITypeLib::FindName`, see the MSDN Library.
